name: The Bear (fuzzface7)
description:
Text-based adventure game kinda (ish) based on Undertale's concept.

The player will face multiple choices throughout the game - determining who they meet, what weapons they get, and what lengths they'll go to in order to defeat The Bear...

Cover art - Pixel Bear by Helostorm on DeviantArt

The game is not too long btw (but there are lots of choices!)
